question:
Match Column-I with Column-II related to an electric dipole of dipole moment <katex>$\vec{p}$</katex> that is placed in a uniform electric field <katex>$\vec{E}$</katex>.

| Column - I (Angle) | Column - II (Potential Energy) |
|---|---|
| a) <katex>$180^{\circ}$</katex> | i) <katex>$-pE$</katex> |
| b) <katex>$120^{\circ}$</katex> | ii) <katex>$pE$</katex> |
| c) <katex>$90^{\circ}$</katex> | iii) <katex>$\frac{1}{2}pE$</katex> |
| | iv) Zero |
